snippet: The government charged two leaders of Bahrain’s largest opposition group with illegally meeting an American official.
abstract: Two leaders of Bahrain's largest opposition group are charged with illegally meeting American official Tom Malinowski, escalating feud with United States that began after Malinowski was expelled from Bahrain.
lead_paragraph: The government charged two leaders of Bahrain’s largest opposition group with illegally meeting an American official.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
